History
=======

2.1.2 (2019-06-04)
------------------

- Upgrade docker image to `tiangolo/uwsgi-nginx-flask:python3.7-alpine3.8`


2.1.1 (2017-05-31)
------------------

- Use official `flask-restful>=0.3.6`
- Add python 3.6 support


2.1.0 (2016-12-04)
------------------

- Add support for multiple filename input in `/list/` resource.


2.0 (2015-12-01)
----------------

- First version.
